attributes.action: Change the way Vitamin B12 is tested and deficiency treated in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
... continued

• Screen those with other autoimmune conditions for Pernicious Anaemia (PA) if they present with low mood and fatigue
• Screen those with “long-covid” for PA
attributes.background:
Ensure NHS England / The Department for Heath and Social Care 
• Test the patients presenting with fatigue and low mood in healthcare settings for Vitamin B12 and folate deficiency
• Change the type of test GPs run to measure B12
• Provide sufficient access to B12 injections for those deficient

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about patient care are a matter for the NHS and individual clinicians, not the UK Government or Parliament.
